commit_scope: Add request-time slow-endpoint telemetry and optimize synchronous read endpoints to reduce event-loop blocking for flow/inventory and contributor endpoints.
evidence_refs:
python3 - <<'PY'
import time, urllib.request

# local
for i in range(1, 6):
    start = time.perf_counter()
    urllib.request.urlopen('http://127.0.0.1:18130/api/inventory/flow', timeout=20)
    print('local_flow_ms', (time.perf_counter()-start)*1000)
PY

python3 - <<'PY'
import time, urllib.request

# production
for i in range(1, 3):
    start = time.perf_counter()
    urllib.request.urlopen('https://coherence-network-production.up.railway.app/api/inventory/flow', timeout=40)
    print('prod_flow_ms', (time.perf_counter()-start)*1000)
PY

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Slow request telemetry identifies API endpoints above threshold, and inventory flow endpoint no longer blocks the asyncio loop; production latency regressions are reduced by avoiding slow synchronous handling on key read routes.
test_flows: run local timing probe against /api/inventory/flow and contributor/contribution read endpoints and compare P95 to baseline
verify slow_endpoint logs emit for /api/inventory/flow when threshold is exceeded
run production endpoint timing probe and capture delta after deploy
